objects.text:
• 9 HOURS COOLING RETENTION
• ADJUSTABLE SHELVES
• AUTO DEFROST SYSTEM
• ENERGY EFFICIENT

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE CLS 2S SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z, Blue,2023 Model)
product_details.description:
- Brand: Whirlpool.
- Model: 205 WDE CLS 2S.
- Capacity: 184 litres.
- Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year.
- Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres.
- Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres.
- Bottle Count: 4.
- Installation Type: Freestanding.
- Part Number: 205 WDE CLS 2S.
- Form Factor: Stand Alone.
- Special Features: Adjustable Shelves.
- Colour: SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z.
- Voltage: 220.
- Wattage: 205 Watts.
- Number of Drawers: 4.
- Defrost System: Automatic.
- Door Orientation: Left.
- Door Material: Stainless Steel.
- Shelf Type: Wire.
- Number of Shelves: 2.
- Certification: Energy Rating.
- Material: Stainless Steel.
- Batteries Required: No.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd.
- Plot No.
- A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800.
- Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 60.5 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 count.
- Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
This banner features a promotional layout highlighting a refrigerator product. The design uses a bold and structured grid-based background divided into four quadrants with varying shades of dark brown, overlapped with subtle white grid lines and decorative elements. The top-left quadrant showcases a prominent title text layer (`heading`) with a bold font, followed by a slimmer subtitle (`subheading`) and a striking red promotional tag (`tagline`). The bottom-left quadrant includes a text block (`description`) listing features in bullet form, accompanied by a large price text (`price`). A red, rounded rectangle call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with embedded text (`cta`) stands out. On the right, a product image (`product_image`) overlays the background, with integrated icons/text on the fridge. The layout is clean and well-organized, ideal for a product advertisement.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Maroon (#3e2021)
- Charcoal Brown (#3c2b2c)
- Cool Gray (#555555)
- Cream White (#f4ebdc)
- Bold Red (#d72300)
product_color: The product image features a Whirlpool refrigerator in a sleek, deep indigo-blue color (#1A1A6F), giving it a modern and premium look. This dominant shade is subtly gradient-blended with a soft violet-gray hue (#B5B2C2) along the curved edges, adding depth and dimension. Crisp white (#FFFFFF) is used for the logo, snowflake icon, and text, providing strong contrast and ensuring readability. The minimal use of red (#A22224) and black (#000000) in the energy rating label subtly grabs attention without overpowering the main visual. This palette creates a cool, reliable, and efficient impression—perfect for advertising cooling and energy retention qualities.
